Game: Crime Scene 2010-02-16T00:00:00-08:00 Crime Scene is a law enforcement detective game with focus on forensics, much like CSI game series. The protagonist of the story is Matt Simmons, a young detective recently promoted from forensics. The story takes place in Crossburg town, where a police detective and his wife are found dead.
